name: Issufi Badji
title: Hello guys!
apresentation: I have over 6 years' experience in web development. My programming journey began with Pascal and, over time, I've honed my skills in various technologies, including C, Python, Java and the web stack (HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript). In addition, I have experience with React.js, Vue.js, Vuetify.js, Node.js, PHP and frameworks such as Laravel. I also have solid knowledge of databases such as MySQL and Oracle XE.Translated with DeepL.com (free version)
